name.ja: エリート<ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>密<rt>みつ</rt></ruby><ruby>捜<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>査<rt>さ</rt></ruby><ruby>官<rt>かん</rt></ruby>ミステリー

requirement.en: Shuffle 2 other face-up Reptile Type monsters from your field and 1 card from your hand into the owner's Deck.

effect.en: This card gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can Special Summon up to 2 Level 7 or higher Reptile Type monsters from your hand and/or Graveyard face-up to your field.
